<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs=""
>
[Pin to the Spot](/Feats.aspx?ID=2215) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing](/Sources.aspx?ID=48) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Provocator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=87)

**Prerequisites**
[Provocator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2211)

</column>

---

You Strike a target within reach. If you hit and deal damage, the target is also restrained as if you had critically succeeded at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35).
name: Pin to the Spot
